title: HOOD CREW Mens Long Sleeve Tops Novelty Designed Regular Fit Polo Shirts
features: 【Fabric】: 65% cotton, 35% polyester, this polo shirts made from soft fabric, comfortable to wear all day long.
【FEATURES】: Color block design, turn down collar with buttons, regular fit, full sleeved, novelty. Great buy for yourself or as a gift/birthday present for your friends/sons/husbands.
【FIT】: Regular fit, if you prefer loose style, you could choose size larger than usual

【Occasion】: Leisure wear, formal work, business, office, golf, tennis, sports, provides an easy choice for all occasions. Good match with casual pants,jeans, as well as inside wear with jacket and coat.
【CARE】: Hand wash or machine wash with cold water (Hand wash recommend) . Hang dry
description: Color Block Long Sleeve Polo Shirts for Man The shirt is US size, you could take your usual size Size Information 0.4 -1 inch errors are allowed due to manual measurement Size S --- Chest 39.8", Shoulder 17.7", Length 28.0" , Sleeve 25.2" Size M --- Chest 41.7", Shoulder 18.5", Length 28.7" ,Sleeve 25.6" Size L --- Chest 43.7", Shoulder 19.3", Length 29.5" ,Sleeve 26.0" Size XL --- Chest 45.7", Shoulder 20.1", Length 30.3" ,Sleeve 26.4" Size XXL --- Chest 47.6", Shoulder 20.9", Length 31.1",Sleeve 26.8" Size 3XL--- Chest 49.6", Shoulder 21.7", Length 31.9",Sleeve 27.2"
